name: Beer Money
description: Beer Money is the Brewery of the Blockchain Era. The token beer is the only one that combines two growing markets such as craft beer and the cryptocurrency market. Beer Money will use blockchain technology to make traceability to all production batches in this way where the user can easily see what trajectory the product they are acquiring had. the token beer can be used within the ecosystem that will create beermoney, where you can exchange for products in the establishments and they can also be used to pay for consumption in beermoney establishments, we also work in alliances so that you not only focus on our ecosystem if not in the beer industry ecosystem as a target market.
